content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria Mamani, it was a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I would like to negotiate the rental price with you. What price range are you looking to pay for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible. How much do you expect for this apartment?

I am very reliable and responsible, so I hope you will consider that in our negotiation. Also, I want to be on good terms with you, so please let me know if there is anything I can do to help you or make the negotiation easier.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Maria. As a landlord, I would like to offer you the best possible price while still maximizing my gains. Based on the current market rates in Mannheim, I am expecting to receive around 800 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment. However, I am open to negotiating the rental price with you based on your specific needs and circumstances.

As for your reliability and responsibility, I appreciate those qualities and would be more likely to consider renting to someone who demonstrates those traits. If there is anything you can do to help make the negotiation easier, please let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that you want to maximize your gains, but as a student, I can only afford a lower price. Is there any possibility of a lower rental price?

I am also very dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with you. I am willing to sign a long-term lease if that is what you prefer. Additionally, I am willing to pay a security deposit if that would help you feel more comfortable.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help you or make the negotiation easier.

I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your willingness to sign a long-term lease. Based on your proposal of 750 Euros per month, I am willing to accept that rental price.

Please note that the rental price does not include utilities such as electricity, water, and gas. You will be responsible for paying those expenses separately. Additionally, please be aware that there may be additional fees associated with the lease, such as move-in fees and maintenance costs.

I hope we can establish a good working relationship and that you enjoy your stay in Mannheim. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
